Washington State Attorney General Nick Brown and more than three dozen state attorneys general are speaking out against the idea. It faces long odds in the Senate.

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence and Marxist Control
articles.author: TLB Staff
articles.summary: A.I. has the same potential to control an individual's mind as Marxism does. It's a mechanical compilation and manipulation of data provided solely by humans to machines. It does not have access to all knowledge, just what it is provided. It can be used to create dependence that gives others control. Parents and educators of young children must work together to help children develop the mental skills mandatory to thrive in life before introducing them to A.I., to avoid the damage and destruction it can cause.

articles.title: What If AI Overtakes Humans?

articles.title: Opinion - Can we save ourselves from the dark side of AI?
articles.author: Thomas P. Vartanian
articles.summary: There is little consensus on the future of artificial intelligence. Nearly 400 million users are expected to have taken advantage of new AI applications over the last five years. It's too late to turn back the clock on how digital technologies have eviscerated our privacy. Non-democratic nations are learning how to use AI as weapons of mass control.

articles.title: Artificial intelligence and Marxist control

In his opinion, AI should not be used in artistic forms.
